content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
──────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage depot.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates (status: NO_FUEL; warnings: ["out of fuel"]).
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates (status: NO_INGREDIENTS; warnings: ["no ingredients to smelt"]).

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science pack(s) for research (status: NO_POWER; research: automation; electrical id: 2312).
- Connected small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (8.5, 6.5), and (10.5, 7.5) forming an electricity network identified as ElectricityGroup with id=2312.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator
Consists of:
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) used for steam production (status: NO_FUEL; warnings: ["out of fuel"]; fluid_systems: [6988]; connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5)).
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water extraction (status: WORKING; fluid_systems: [6988]).
- Steam Engine at position(2.5, 21.5) for electricity generation (status: NOT_CONNECTED; warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"]; connection points at (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5)).
- Pipeline Network comprising:
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=6988 at position(-6.5, 20.5) (status: WORKING).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=6989 at position(-2.5, 20.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=6990 at position(-0.5, 21.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=6995 at position(-3.5, 23.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=6994 at position(-7.5, 25.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=6999 at position(3.5, 25.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=6998 at position(2.5, 24.5) (status: EMPTY).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=7001 at position(-0.5, 28.5) (status: EMPTY).
- Electricity Network: ElectricityGroup with id=2312 connecting poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (8.5, 6.5), and (10.5, 7.5).

ERROR TIPS
──────────────────────
• Fluid System Connection Failures:
  - Multiple attempts to connect the steam engine using PipeGroups with fluid_system IDs [6644, 6687, 6730, 6773, 6816, 6859, 6902, 6945] were unsuccessful. Ensure that the selected fluid_system reference matches the currently active PipeGroup (now [6988]) before attempting a connection.

• Pipeline Stabilization and Alignment:
  - Confirm that all pipe segments are precisely aligned and clear of obstructions, and allow sufficient stabilization time between connection attempts to ensure the pipeline network is fully operational.

• Steam Engine and Power Network Configuration:
  - Verify that the steam engine maintains proper integration with both a functioning pipeline network (using valid fluid_system references) and an active electricity network (ElectricityGroup id updated to 2312) to eliminate persistent connection warnings.
